Software Engineer - Backend

Company: TechCorp Inc.
Location: San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
Job ID: TC-2024-1234

About Us
TechCorp is a leading technology company building the next generation of cloud infrastructure. We serve millions of users worldwide and are growing rapidly.

The Role
We're looking for a talented Backend Software Engineer to join our Platform team. You'll work on building scalable microservices that power our core product offerings.

Responsibilities
- Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservices
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
- Collaborate with frontend engineers and product managers
- Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
- Contribute to system architecture decisions
- On-call rotation for production systems

Requirements
- 3+ years of experience in backend development
- Proficiency in Python, Go, or Java
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
- Strong understanding of distributed systems
- Excellent problem-solving skills

Nice to Have
- Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
- Knowledge of message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ)
- Contributions to open-source projects

Compensation
$150,000 - $200,000 annually + equity + benefits

Benefits
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) with company match
- Unlimited PTO
- Remote work flexibility
- Professional development budget

TechCorp is an equal opportunity employer.
